sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAHOS, or Shohos, Africans of Hamitic stock living to the W. of Massawa. Some authorities regard them as true Abys-sinians, but more probably they are akin to the Gallas and Afars. They are for the most part Mahommedans, but some few are Christians.
